items.name: static var determined: HMHomeManagerAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The user has set the app’s level of access to home data.

items.name: static var authorized: HMHomeManagerAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The app has access to home data.

items.name: static var restricted: HMHomeManagerAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The app doesn’t have access to home data.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates an access status from a raw value.
